function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to address new behaviors and values in recovery packages","Impact":"Ineffective recovery and sustainable transitions","Mitigation":"Include new behaviors, values, and evidence in recovery package design","Technologies":"Behavioral analysis tools, value mapping software","People":"Policymakers, government agencies","Owner":"Policy and decision-making authorities"},{"Description":"Inability to shape future outcomes through present actions","Impact":"Missed opportunity to create positive future outcomes","Mitigation":"Promote understanding of the long-term effects of present actions","Technologies":"Predictive modeling tools, scenario planning software","People":"Academics, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Academic institutions, research organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to turn global health crisis into a sustainable opportunity","Impact":"Missed opportunity for more sustainable human security and environmental sustainability","Mitigation":"Implement strategies to put the world on a more sustainable path","Technologies":"Sustainable technology solutions, global health management systems","People":"Society at large, policymakers","Owner":"Global organizations, government bodies"}]}
